long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's easy to get distracted when browsing the web. Five Minute Stoic is a an extension that displays a Stoic quote when you click New Tab in Chrome.  This action allow you to be more mindful and hopefully pause and reflect on the ancient wisdom of the Stoics.
